New Records: Shaheen Afridi took 3 wickets for 14 runs
Key Match Events: Shadab Khan's 20-ball 50 turned the game on its head
Iftikhar Ahmed made 51 in 35 balls and anchored the innings
Shaheen Afridi took three wickets and was the pick among the bowlers
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan turned to their A-game and handed South Africa their first defeat of the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Shadab Khan produced a special all-round effort as Pakistan kept their semifinal hopes alive with a 33-run win over South Africa
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was rain-curtailed and South Africa were set a revised target of 142 runs in 14 overs
Pakistan moved up to the third spot in group 2 while South Africa continued to stay second behind leaders India
